abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.

error.open_failed: Cannot open the specified serial port.

user.description:
Connect the LiteJet's RS232-2 port to your computer and enter the path to the serial port device.

The LiteJet MCP must be configured for 19.2 K baud, 8 data bits, 1 stop bit, no parity, and to transmit a 'CR' after each response.
user.title: Connect To LiteJet

deprecated_yaml_serial_exception.description:
Configuring LiteJet using YAML is being removed but there was an error opening the serial port when importing your YAML configuration.

Correct the YAML configuration and restart Home Assistant to try again or manually continue to [set up the integration]({url}).
deprecated_yaml_serial_exception.title: The LiteJet YAML configuration import failed
